analyticsCatalog.objectType.title.comment: Title of the header section containing the object type selection.

analyticsCatalog.objectType.dashboard.bu.comment: ARIA label for the Dashboard object type

analyticsCatalog.objectType.visualizatio.comment: ARIA label for the Visualization object type

analyticsCatalog.objectType.metric.butto.comment: ARIA label for the Metric object type

analyticsCatalog.objectType.fact.button..comment: ARIA label for the Fact object type

analyticsCatalog.objectType.attribute.bu.comment: ARIA label for the Attribute object type

analyticsCatalog.filter.createdBy.title.comment: Title of the header section containing the created by filter.

analyticsCatalog.filter.createdBy.noOpti.comment: Label for the no options state in the created by filter.

analyticsCatalog.filter.tags.title.comment: Title of the header section containing the tags filter.

analyticsCatalog.filter.tags.noOptions.comment: Label for the no options state in the tags filter.

analyticsCatalog.filter.origin.title.comment: Title of the header section containing the origin filter.

analyticsCatalog.filter.origin.parents.comment: Label for the parents option in the origin filter.

analyticsCatalog.filter.origin.native.comment: Label for the native option in the origin filter.

analyticsCatalog.column.title.label.comment: Title of the column containing the title of the object.

analyticsCatalog.column.title.createdBy.comment: Title of the column containing the name of the creator of the object.

analyticsCatalog.column.title.createdAt.comment: Title of the column containing the creation date of the object.

analyticsCatalog.column.title.tags.comment: Title of the column containing the tags of the object.

analyticsCatalog.column.title.updatedAt.comment: Title of the column containing the last modified date of the object.

analyticsCatalog.column.title.updatedBy.comment: Title of the column containing the name of the last modifier of the object.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.more.comment: Label for the button that opens more tags  in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.noTa.comment: Label for the message shown when there are no tags in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.clos.comment: Label for the button that closes tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.addL.comment: Label for the button that opens add tag modal in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.name.comment: Label for the name input in add tag modal in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.canc.comment: Label for the cancel button in add tag modal in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.save.comment: Label for the save button in add tag modal in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.tags.manager.label.remo.comment: Label for the remove button in tags manager component.

analyticsCatalog.error.unknown.message.comment: Generic error message for unidentified or unexpected errors

analyticsCatalog.error.unknown.descripti.value: We’re not quite sure what went wrong. Please try again later.
analyticsCatalog.error.unknown.descripti.comment: Instructions for users when encountering unknown errors

analyticsCatalog.error.unauthorized.mess.comment: Error message shown when the user does not have permission to view the analytics catalog or its data.

analyticsCatalog.error.unauthorized.desc.value: Sorry you don't have access to the analytics catalog. Ask your administrator to grant you permissions.
analyticsCatalog.error.unauthorized.desc.comment: Explanation shown when the user lacks permissions to view the analytics catalog, providing instructions for resolution.

analyticsCatalog.catalogItem.closeButton.comment: Label for the close button in the catalog item overlay.

analyticsCatalog.catalogItem.overlayLabe.comment: Label for the catalog item overlay.

analyticsCatalog.catalogItem.update.fail.value: Failed to update catalog item. Try again later.

analyticsCatalog.catalogItem.lock.value: You can’t edit or delete this catalog item — it was created in the parent workspace. To make changes, open the parent workspace.

analyticsCatalog.tooltip.content.value: Centralized catalog of dashboards, metrics, visualizations, facts, and attributes. Explore, manage, and update all objects in one place to support consistent governance, quicker insights, and improved collaboration.
analyticsCatalog.tooltip.content.comment: Tooltip content for the help icon in the header.

analyticsCatalog.search.label.comment: Accessible label for the search input.

analyticsCatalog.tabs.catalog.comment: Tab label for the main analytics catalog list.

analyticsCatalog.tabs.memory.comment: Tab label for the Memory items section.

analyticsCatalog.memory.column.instructi.comment: Column header for memory item instruction.

analyticsCatalog.memory.column.type.labe.comment: Column header for memory item type.

analyticsCatalog.memory.column.keywords..comment: Column header for memory item keywords.

analyticsCatalog.memory.column.actions.l.comment: Column header for memory item actions.

analyticsCatalog.memory.empty.title.comment: Title shown when memory list is empty.

analyticsCatalog.memory.empty.descriptio.value: Create your first memory item to get started.
analyticsCatalog.memory.empty.descriptio.comment: Description shown when memory list is empty.

analyticsCatalog.empty.search.title.comment: Title of the empty state when search input is filled.

analyticsCatalog.empty.search.descriptio.value: Check the spelling or adjust filters.
analyticsCatalog.empty.search.descriptio.comment: Description of the empty state when search input is filled.

analyticsCatalog.empty.filters.title.comment: Title of the empty state when filters are applied but search input is empty.

analyticsCatalog.empty.filters.descripti.value: No matching items found for the selected filters.
analyticsCatalog.empty.filters.descripti.comment: Description of the empty state when filters are applied but search input is empty.
